about_the_game:
Hallowed Nights Survivors Chest, Part II

The thrilling sequel is here at last,
To complete your set from Hallowed Nights past.
With looks simply monstrous, the scares will abound,
Why should frights stay in Autumn? Rain terror year round!

Includes
  • The Candy Man Chest
  • The Straw-Stuffed Chest
  • The Vampiric Chest
  • The Bewitched Chest
  • The Creature Chest
  • The Draconic Chest
detailed_description:

The thrilling sequel is here at last,

With looks simply monstrous, the scares will abound,

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: The sequel! This Hallowed Nights Chest contains skins for: Warly, Wigfrid, Maxwell, Wickerbottom, Winona, and Wortox.

English*, Simplified Chinese*
